content: --युज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} yoking the horses. {2} having horses yoked to it (as a carriage); रथेनाश्वयुजा <ls>Rām.</ls> {3} born under the constellation अश्वयुज्. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} <ab>N.</ab> of a constellation, the head of Aries. {2} the first lunar mansion. {3} the month of Āśvina. {4} a chariot having horses.
